sentences.english: Subsequently, the Hanhai army stationed at Tingzhou, which related Hanhai to the western region.

sentences.english: The first lion was presented to China during the Eastern Han Dynasty by a king from the Western Regions.
sentences.chinese: 東漢時，西域安息國王向中國獻上了第一頭獅子。

sentences.english: During the Western Han Dynasty, who was twice sent on a diplomatic mission to the western territories?

sentences.english: After reunifying the Western Uegions, the Tang Dynasty instituted the local administrative system.
sentences.chinese: 唐朝在重新統一西域以後，實行了地方行政制度。

sentences.english: Formerly known as the Western Territory, Xinjiang has been an inalienable part of China since ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 新疆古稱西域，自古以來就是中國不可分割的一部分。

sentences.english: Western Region has always been a region where a number of religions exist side by side.
sentences.chinese: 西域地區總是會有很多的宗教信仰存在。

sentences.english: Song Bolus Western Region poems have their own distinctive characteristics at the end of the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 清末詩人宋伯魯的西域詩有自己獨有的特點。

sentences.english: Just in this background, Ban Chao was sent to Xiyu in which he pursued anti-Hunnish activities for over thirty years.
sentences.chinese: 班超正是在這種情況下被派往西域，經略三十餘年的。

sentences.english: Chen Yin was the only person who settled in the border area and never returned inland among the Western Region poets during the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 陳寅是清代西域詩人中唯一一位沒有返回關內的戍客。

sentences.english: She is the woman, and he is the man.
sentences.chinese: 她是西域女子，而他是中原男子。

sentences.english: Hetian was the center of the Buddhist faith in the early years of Western Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 和田是早期中的中國西域歷史中的佛教中心。

sentences.english: Would he today be fronting Westlife, or be a Back Street Boy?
sentences.chinese: 今天成了西域男孩還是后街男孩呢？

sentences.chinese: 由此可見時人對於《西域同文志》的陌生。
